privacy.p_intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Aakar Pratishthan Poladpur Raigad collects, uses, shares, and protects digital personal data obtained through its website, donation and volunteer forms, events, and program operations. Aakar Pratishthan Poladpur Raigad is a registered public trust with its correspondence address at c/o House No. 866, Kapade Budruk, Taluka Poladpur, District Raigad 402303, Maharashtra, India.
privacy.p1: This policy applies to donors, volunteers, beneficiaries, partners, and site visitors whose personal data is processed by Aakar Pratishthan as a Data Fiduciary under the DPDP Act, 2023.

p2.li1: Identity and contact information: Name, address, email, and phone when you donate, volunteer, or participate in programs.
p2.li2: Transaction and donation details: Necessary to issue receipts and comply with legal obligations.
p2.li3: Program information: Voluntarily provided for service delivery and reporting.
p2.li4: Device and interaction data: Limited data to operate the website and manage consent for non-essential cookies.

privacy.p3: Processing is primarily based on valid, free, specific, informed, and unambiguous consent obtained through clear affirmative action for defined purposes. Processing may also occur for "legitimate uses" allowed by the Act, such as voluntary provision of data or compliance with the law.
privacy.p4: Aakar Pratishthan will not process the personal data of children under 18 without verifiable parental or guardian consent and will avoid harmful processing, tracking, or targeted advertising directed at children.
privacy.p5: Personal data may be shared with service providers (e.g., payment gateways) under written contracts that bind them to confidentiality and security. Cross-border transfers will be allowed unless restricted by the Central Government.
privacy.p6: Aakar Pratishthan will implement reasonable security safeguards to prevent personal data breaches and unauthorized access or disclosure.
privacy.p7: Personal data will be retained only for as long as necessary for the stated purposes or to meet legal and audit requirements, after which it will be securely deleted.
privacy.p8: You may request access to your information, seek correction or erasure of personal data, and withdraw consent as provided in the Act.
privacy.p9: Aakar Pratishthan provides a readily available grievance mechanism.

p9_address.l1: Grievance Officer: President/Authorized Officer, Aakar Pratishthan Poladpur Raigad
p9_address.l2: Address: c/o House No. 866, Kapade Budruk, Taluka Poladpur, District Raigad 402303, Maharashtra, India.

privacy.p10: In the event of a personal data breach, Aakar Pratishthan will notify the Data Protection Board of India and affected individuals as required by the Act.
privacy.p11: This policy may be updated to reflect changes in law or operations. A refreshed notice will be provided where required.
